content.rendered:
Directed by Brahmanand S. Singh. Tanvi Jain

Written by Tanvi Jain. Prakash Jha. Brahmanand S. Singh. Kamlesh Kunti Singh

Cast Boman Irani (Kailash Satyarthi). Tannishtha Chatterjee (Priti Vyas). Sanjay Suri (DM Sanjay Bhartiya). Divya Dutta (Sunita Bhartiya). Govind Namdeo (RamPrasad). Yatin Karyekar (Sipahi). Joy Sengupta (SDM Akhilesh). Akhilendra Mishra (Chakiya). Bachan Pachehra (Rahim Chacha (as Bachchan Pachera)). Vikram Shankar Singh (Lakhna (as Vikram Singh)). Sanchita Goswami (Phullorani). Aarti Jha (Jhalki). Goraksha Sakpal (Babu) . Mahesh Chandra Deva (Ramprasad’s man 1 (as Mahesh Deva)). Sailessh Dubey (Mohan (as Sailesh Dubey))

Languages Hindi

Producers Supavitra Babul. Annand Chavan. Neerraj Rc Gohil. Tanvi Jain. Jayesh Parekh. Brahmanand S. Singh

Production Mobius Film. Ofbeat Media Guid
